name: CatCatch
description: CatCatch is a casual Arkanoid game. Enter diverse rooms full of books, plants, or unknown devices. Control magic balls to clear obstacles and find out all cats.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.2 GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
